A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Casuals and new fans will like it. Star Wars fans will hate it. You can see proof of that on here. The 4/5 star reviews are followed by one sentence like...\"Great fun\, looked pretty and was funny\".\nThe low reviews are followed by the long list of reasons why they just didnt grasp the feel of the Star Wars universe and made a plainly bad movie.
